root.name: FireFly Studios' Stronghold Warchest
root.description: Stronghold Warchest contains Stronghold and Stronghold Crusader in it. It also adds more invasion maps to Stronghold, more skirmish maps for Crusader, a new skirmish trail (30 stages) and 8 new computer opponents for Crusader. In addition, it patches both games to the latest updates.
